member.name: IDVEnc.get_IFormatResolution

summary.para: [The feature associated with this page, DirectShow, is a legacy feature. It has been superseded by MediaPlayer and . The get_IFormatResolution method retrieves the encoding resolution.

member.param: Pointer to a variable that receives a member of the enumeration, specifying the video standard in use (NTSC or PAL).
Pointer to a variable that receives a member of the enumeration, specifying the digital video (DV) format.
Pointer to a variable that receives a member of the enumeration, specifying the video resolution.
Boolean value specifying whether to retrieve the structure that specifies the stream format. If TRUE, the stream format is returned in the sDVInfo parameter.
Pointer to a variable that receives a DVINFO structure containing the stream format. If fDVInfo is FALSE, this parameter is ignored.
member.returns: Returns S_OK if successful. Otherwise, returns E_FAIL or another error code.

The put_IFormatResolution method sets the encoding resolution.

member.param: Member of the enumeration, specifying the video standard to use (NTSC or PAL).
Member of the enumeration, specifying the DV format.
Member of the enumeration, specifying the video resolution.
Boolean value specifying whether the sDVInfo parameter contains a valid structure. To set the stream format, set this parameter to TRUE and specify the format chunk with the sDVInfo parameter.
If fDVInfo is TRUE, must point to a DVINFO structure that describes the stream format.
member.returns: Returns S_OK if successful. Otherwise, returns E_FAIL or another error code.
